actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide benefits comparable to black lung benefits to all widows of miners who die from employment in coal mines.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of benefits under the Federal Coal Mine Health and Safety Act to all widows of miners who die from employment in coal mines.

titles.title: A bill to provide benefits comparable to black lung benefits to all widows of miners who die from employment in coal mines.
